query:
SELECT playerName, team, bidAmount, dropPlayer, createdAt 
FROM fa_bids 
WHERE windowId = '2025-01-15-PM' 
AND (playerName, bidAmount, createdAt) IN (
  SELECT playerName, MAX(bidAmount), MAX(createdAt)
  FROM fa_bids 
  WHERE windowId = '2025-01-15-PM'
  GROUP BY playerName
)
ORDER BY playerName, createdAt DESC
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user waCuRew5RKYFFjj.root --database DS68jwRuNTWiz9tNrw6KXW --execute SELECT playerName, team, bidAmount, dropPlayer, createdAt 
FROM fa_bids 
WHERE windowId = '2025-01-15-PM' 
AND (playerName, bidAmount, createdAt) IN (
  SELECT playerName, MAX(bidAmount), MAX(createdAt)
  FROM fa_bids 
  WHERE windowId = '2025-01-15-PM'
  GROUP BY playerName
)
ORDER BY playerName, createdAt DESC
